title: Sepp Kuss and His Journey from Scrawny MTB Kid to Vuelta a España Champion
content:
'He was just this skinny, natural-born explorer kid': Kuss' past and present coaches track his path from Durango Devo junior to grand tour winner.

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss and His Journey from Scrawny MTB Kid to Vuelta a España Champion on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
